banner.text:
Let's take our game to next level!
You're going to use variables to keep score.
Do you remember where the variable code lives?

This block lets you make a variable, or set its value.
Grab it.

Connect it above the repeat loop.
If you drop it in here, the blocks will organise themselves.
Now, open the Variables tray again.
Connect it to the last variable block.

You just made a new score variable, and set its value to 0...
Next, you’ll add to the score every time the Hero eats the dot.
This block adds a number to a variable. Grab one!
Connect it beneath the speaker code.

Made sure you’re adding numbers to the right variable.
Change this from item to score.

Now every time the Hero eats a dot, the score goes up by one!
But only in the code: we don’t see anything on the pixel kit ... yet.

Nice! You’re almost done making an awesome game...
soon you’ll be able to show players their score.
